description: Creates an alias for a directory and assigns the alias to the directory. The alias is used to construct the access URL for the directory, such as http://<alias>.awsapps.com.

parameters.name: DirectoryId
parameters.description: The identifier of the directory for which to create the alias.

parameters.name: Alias
parameters.description: The requested alias. The alias must be unique amongst all aliases in Amazon Web Services. This operation throws an EntityAlreadyExistsException error if the alias already exists.
